file-upload.title: Upload CSV
file-upload.subtitle: Upload your file for import
file-upload.data-type-description: Select the type of data to be loaded for the import to work correctly

upload-result.max-size-error: The file size limit is {{ fileMaxSize }}. The file size is too large. Try to upload another one.
upload-result.file-type-error: CSV format is required. The suggested file is in different format.

csv-file-delete.title: Delete CSV
csv-file-delete.subtitle: Are you sure you want to delete this csv file?

csv-file-delete-and-close-preview.title: Delete CSV
csv-file-delete-and-close-preview.subtitle: Are you sure you want to close preview and delete file

validation-errors.exceeding-file-max-size: The file size limit is {{ fileMaxSize }}. The file size is too large. Try to upload another one.
validation-errors.wrong-delimiter: The wrong delimiter. Should be used ';'.
validation-errors.exceeding-line-limits: The import limit is {{ importLimitOfLines }} lines but your file contains {{ linesCount }} lines. The file can not be imported.
validation-errors.missing-required-columns: The required columns: "{{ missedColumns }}" are not in the file. The file can not be imported.
